message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You wanted 50/50, but I think I deserve more for being the first to propose!
You're greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a fair deal!
You think you're being generous, but I'm still not sold on this deal. I want more!
You're not getting any more generous, Bob? I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're not budging, I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this deal...
You're really trying to squeeze me out, Bob! I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to get pushed around!
You're not backing down, I'll try to meet you in the middle... but just barely!
